concept.title: USAFA PGI 5306.502 Duties and Responsibilities

conbody.p: The primary Competition and Commercial Advocate for USAFA is Mr. James Anderson and the alternate Competition and Commercial Advocate for USAFA is Ms. Kim Diercks.
